/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is divided by a median, creating a sense of symmetry and order. Streetlights line the road, standing like sentinels, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky.
